doc.title: La table tournante
doc.plot: This smacks of spiritualism. To see the table, an ordinary one, float through the air and settle any place designated by the operator, makes one think he is attending the s√©ance of a spiritualist. The tricks are weird and wonderful, marvelous to behold, and stamp this film as one of the mysteries of life-motion photography. We recommend this picture to everyone who wants mystical subjects.
